Package gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.calc

Hazard calculation classes and utilties.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalcConfig
    Calculation configuration.
    CalcConfig.Builder
    A builder of configuration instances.
    CalcConfig.Deagg
    Deaggregation configuration.
    CalcConfig.Deagg.Bins
    The distance, magnitude, and epsilon bins into which contributing sources to hazard will be sorted.
    CalcConfig.Hazard
    Hazard calculation configuration.
    CalcConfig.Output
    Data and file output settings.
    CalcConfig.Performance
    Performance and optimization settings.
    CalcConfig.Rate
    Magnitude-frequency distribution configuration.
    CalcConfig.Rate.Bins
    The mfd magnitude discretization.
    CalcConfig.SiteDefaults
    Default site settings.
    Deaggregation
    Hazard deaggregation.
    EqRate
    General purpose earthquake rate and probability data container.
    EqRateExport
    Earthquake rate and probability exporter.
    Hazard
    The result of a hazard calculation.
    HazardCalcs
    Static probabilistic seismic hazard analysis calculators.
    HazardExport
    Hazard calculation result exporter.
    HazardInput
    A GroundMotionModel input that carries Rupture rate information along with it
    InputList
    Lightweight List wrapper of HazardInputs.
    Site
    Site characteristics container.
    Site.Builder
    A reusable Site builder.
    Sites
    Iterable Site container.
    SystemInputList
    A List of HazardInputs that contains a reference to the parent SystemSourceSet from which the inputs were derived.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataType
    Data type identifiers.
    DistributionFormat
    Distribution format.
    ExceedanceModel
    Uncertainty models govern how the values of a complementary cumulative normal distribution (or probability of exceedence) are computed given a mean, μ, standard deviation, σ, and other possibly relevant arguments.
    ReturnPeriod
    Identifiers of common return periods, also referred to in PSHA as probabilities of exceedance.
    ThreadCount
    The number of threads with which to intialize thread pools.
    ValueFormat
    Hazard curve value types.
    Vs30
    Identifiers for commonly used values of Vs30.

Package gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.calc Description

Hazard calculation classes and utilties.
